one.block.eosiojava.utilities

Class DateFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • one.block.eosiojava.utilities.DateFormatter

  • public class DateFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods to handle the formatting of dates and times to supported patterns.

    • Method Detail

      • convertBackendTimeToMilli

        public static long convertBackendTimeToMilli(java.lang.String backendTime)
                                      throws java.text.ParseException
        Converting backend time to millisecond.

        Backend time pattern "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.sss" in GMT.

        Parameters:
        backendTime - input backend time.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT represented by parsed input backend time.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - thrown if the input does not match with any supported datetime pattern.

      • convertMilliSecondToBackendTimeString

        public static java.lang.String convertMilliSecondToBackendTimeString(long timeInMilliSeconds)
        Convert milliseconds to time string format used on blockchain.

        Backend time pattern "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.sss" in GMT

        Parameters:
        timeInMilliSeconds - input number of milliseconds
        Returns:
        String format of input number of milliseconds
